statements.select:
select a.I_IntId ,a.C_WgtlistNo ,a.C_PlanNo ,a.C_HeatNo ,a.C_BatchNo ,a.C_LronNo ,a.C_TankNo ,a.C_ToDeptNo ,a.C_ToDeptName ,a.N_GrossWgt ,a.N_TareWgt ,a.N_TareWgt1 ,a.N_NetWgt ,a.N_NetWgt1 ,a.N_SlagNum ,a.N_NetWgt2 ,a.D_GrossWgtTime ,a.D_TareWgtTime ,a.C_GrossWgtSiteNo ,a.C_GrossWgtSiteName ,a.C_TareWgtSiteNo ,a.C_TareWgtSiteName ,a.C_GrossWgtMan ,a.C_TareWgtMan ,a.C_TrainGroupGross ,a.C_TrainGroupTare ,a.C_PlanStatus ,a.C_UpLoadStatus ,a.C_Remark ,a.C_PondRemark ,a.I_DataFlag ,a.I_BillStatus ,a.C_Reserve1 ,a.C_Reserve2 ,a.C_Reserve3 ,a.I_Reserve1 ,a.I_Reserve2 ,a.I_Reserve3 ,a.C_ReserveFlag1 ,a.C_ReserveFlag2 ,a.C_ReserveFlag3 ,a.I_ReserveFlag1 ,a.I_ReserveFlag2 ,a.I_ReserveFlag3 ,a.C_PlanCreateUser ,a.D_PlanCreateTime ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime ,a.C_UpDateColumns ,a.C_UpDateHistoryUser ,a.C_UpDateHistoryTime ,a.C_ComputerIp
from PM_POND_BILL_IRON_HISTORY a where I_DataFlag = 1
C_WgtlistNo=#WgtlistNo#
C_PlanNo=#PlanNo#
C_HeatNo=#HeatNo#
C_TankNo=#TankNo#
C_UpDateHistoryTime between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
order by C_UpDateHistoryTime desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.C_WgtlistNo ,a.C_PlanNo ,a.C_HeatNo ,a.C_BatchNo ,a.C_LronNo ,a.C_TankNo ,a.C_ToDeptNo ,a.C_ToDeptName ,a.N_GrossWgt ,a.N_TareWgt ,a.N_TareWgt1 ,a.N_NetWgt ,a.N_NetWgt1 ,a.N_SlagNum ,a.N_NetWgt2 ,a.D_GrossWgtTime ,a.D_TareWgtTime ,a.C_GrossWgtSiteNo ,a.C_GrossWgtSiteName ,a.C_TareWgtSiteNo ,a.C_TareWgtSiteName ,a.C_GrossWgtMan ,a.C_TareWgtMan ,a.C_TrainGroupGross ,a.C_TrainGroupTare ,a.C_PlanStatus ,a.C_UpLoadStatus ,a.C_Remark ,a.C_PondRemark ,a.I_DataFlag ,a.I_BillStatus ,a.C_Reserve1 ,a.C_Reserve2 ,a.C_Reserve3 ,a.I_Reserve1 ,a.I_Reserve2 ,a.I_Reserve3 ,a.C_ReserveFlag1 ,a.C_ReserveFlag2 ,a.C_ReserveFlag3 ,a.I_ReserveFlag1 ,a.I_ReserveFlag2 ,a.I_ReserveFlag3 ,a.C_PlanCreateUser ,a.D_PlanCreateTime ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime ,a.C_UpDateColumns ,a.C_UpDateHistoryUser ,a.C_UpDateHistoryTime ,a.C_ComputerIp
from PM_POND_BILL_IRON_HISTORY a where C_WgtlistNo=#WgtlistNo# and I_ReserveFlag1 = 0
statements.update: update PM_POND_BILL_IRON_HISTORY set C_PlanNo=#PlanNo#, C_WgtlistNo=#WgtlistNo#, C_HeatNo=#HeatNo#, C_BatchNo=#BatchNo#, C_LronNo=#LronNo#, C_TankNo=#TankNo#, C_ToDeptNo=#ToDeptNo#, C_ToDeptName=#ToDeptName#, N_GrossWgt=#GrossWgt#, N_TareWgt=#TareWgt#, N_TareWgt1=#TareWgt1#, N_NetWgt=#NetWgt#, N_NetWgt1=#NetWgt1#, N_SlagNum=#SlagNum#, N_NetWgt2=#NetWgt2#, D_GrossWgtTime=#GrossWgtTime#, D_TareWgtTime=#TareWgtTime#, C_GrossWgtSiteNo=#GrossWgtSiteNo#, C_GrossWgtSiteName=#GrossWgtSiteName#, C_TareWgtSiteNo=#TareWgtSiteNo#, C_TareWgtSiteName=#TareWgtSiteName#, C_GrossWgtMan=#GrossWgtMan#, C_TareWgtMan=#TareWgtMan#, C_TrainGroupGross=#TrainGroupGross#, C_TrainGroupTare=#TrainGroupTare#, C_PlanStatus=#PlanStatus#, C_UpLoadStatus=#UpLoadStatus#, C_Remark=#Remark#, C_PondRemark=#PondRemark#, C_Reserve1=#CReserve1#, C_Reserve2=#CReserve2#, C_Reserve3=#CReserve3#, I_Reserve1=#IReserve1#, I_Reserve2=#IReserve2#, I_Reserve3=#IReserve3#, C_ReserveFlag1=#CReserveFlag1#, C_ReserveFlag2=#CReserveFlag2#, C_ReserveFlag3=#CReserveFlag3#, I_ReserveFlag1=#IReserveFlag1#, I_ReserveFlag2=#IReserveFlag2#, I_ReserveFlag3=#IReserveFlag3#, I_DataFlag=#DataFlag.EntityValue#, I_BillStatus=#BillStatus.IntValue#, C_PlanCreateUser=#PlanCreateUser#, D_PlanCreateTime=#PlanCreateTime#, C_CreateUser=#CreateUser#, D_CreateTime=#CreateTime#, C_UpdateUser=#UpdateUser#, D_UpdateTime=#UpdateTime#, C_UpDateColumns=#UpDateColumns#, C_UpDateHistoryUser=#UpDateHistoryUser#, C_UpDateHistoryTime=#UpDateHistoryTime#, C_ComputerIp=#ComputerIp# where C_WgtlistNo=#WgtlistNo# and I_ReserveFlag1 = 0

update PM_Pond_Bill_Iron_History set C_ComputerIp=#ComputerIp#, C_UpDateHistoryUser=#UpDateHistoryUser#, C_UpDateHistoryTime=#UpDateHistoryTime#, I_ReserveFlag1=#IReserveFlag1# where I_IntId = #IntId#
